facts: Map: When you enter from the main gate, you come directly in front of A Block and B Block. A Block is the main academic building and contains the Library on the 1st floor and the 24/7 C-Shop on the ground floor.
Map: B Block (School of Law) is next to A Block near the main gate.
Map: Behind A Block and B Block are all the hostel areas.
Hostels: The boys' hostels are named C1 through C12 and are located on the left side when you stand facing the hostels from A/B block.
Hostels: The girls' hostels are named D1 through D6 and are located on the right side when you stand facing the hostels from A/B block.
Map: From A and B Block, if you walk straight ahead and then turn left, you reach the 'Snapeats' food outlet.
Food: Snapeats is a food outlet located to the left of the straight path from A/B Block area.
Map: From A and B Block, if you walk straight ahead without turning left, you first see the LRC (Learning Resource Center) and the paid mess on your left side.
Map: If you keep going straight past the LRC and paid mess, you reach the main auditorium, also known as the 'German Hanger'.
Map: At the German Hanger, N Block is on the left side and P Block is on the right side. There is nothing behind the German Hanger.
Food: N Block contains food outlets Kathi House and Domino's.
Map: N Block is located to the left side of the German Hanger.
Map: P Block is located to the right side of the German Hanger.
Map: If you go back to the A/B block area and face towards the hostels (away from the main gate), the boys' hostels C1–C12 are on the left and the girls' hostels D1–D6 are on the right.
Map: When you walk forward from the hostel side, you reach the 'Gobble' mess hall. Gobble is in front of D6 (girls hostel) and to the right of C11 (boys hostel).
Food: The main mess hall is named 'Gobble' and is used by both hostel students.
Map: If you walk a little further ahead from Gobble, you see the volleyball court and the lawn tennis court.
Map: If you go right from Gobble, you reach the sports complex which includes the swimming pool, indoor basketball court, and indoor badminton court.
Map: To the right of the sports complex are the outdoor basketball court and the main football field.
Map: Continuing further ahead from the sports complex area loops you back towards the main gate.
Study: The LRC (Learning Resource Center) is a dedicated quiet study space located along the straight path from A/B Block before German Hanger.

Sports: Facilities at Bennett include a swimming pool, indoor badminton court, indoor basketball court, outdoor basketball court, volleyball court, lawn tennis court, squash court, table tennis, billiards, chess, and carrom.
Wi-Fi: Students can obtain Bennett Wi-Fi credentials from the IT helpdesk or through the official student portal. The bot must NEVER invent or reveal any Wi-Fi password.
